definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled

sentences.english: Chicken noodle soup has been especially vexing, he said.
sentences.chinese: 鸡肉面汤特别麻烦，他说。

sentences.english: "Bosses to" I can not wait to submit applications.
sentences.chinese: “老板，来两碗面汤”我迫不及待的提出申请。

sentences.english: We are Noodle people. Broth escapes scampers deep through our veins.
sentences.chinese: 我们是面条家族，血管中流着面汤。

sentences.english: I can smell some nice noodle soup.
sentences.chinese: 我能闻到美味的面汤的味道。

sentences.english: Italian Stir 3 Tbsp pesto and 1 c cooked pasta into the finished soup.
sentences.chinese: 用3大勺香蒜和意大利面条与一号肉汤熬成面汤。

sentences.english: We are Noodle folk, Broth runs deep through our veins .
sentences.chinese: 我们是做面条的，我们血液里流淌着面汤。

sentences.english: Would you like chowder or chicken noodle?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢杂脍，还是鸡肉面汤？

sentences.english: We are noddle folk, Broth runs deep through our veins.
sentences.chinese: 我们都是做面条的，我们血液里流淌着面汤。

sentences.english: Do you want some noodle soup for lunch?
In the original review, I comment that the broth was 'nightmarish.
sentences.chinese: 在我之前的评论中，曾说它的面汤就是“一场噩梦”。

sentences.english: Po: Wait, wait. It's just plain old noodle soup?
sentences.chinese: 等等，不过是普通的面汤？

sentences.english: The broth has a decent richness and slight oiliness which is just right.
sentences.chinese: 面汤香味浓郁，稍微有点儿滑腻，这样刚刚好。

definition: hot and sour soup/sour and spicy soup
raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
clear soup/white broth, also called 奶湯|奶汤[nai3 tang1]/decoction of chrysanthemum, liquorice and certain other herbs
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
